DataElement.preferredName: Treating Surgeon Complete Checklist Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes No question for whether the treating surgeon completed this checklist.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Providing treatment for._A physician who treats disease, injury, and deformity by operation or manipulation that involves gaining access to the patient's body by incisional access._A list of items required or things to be done or considered._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Providing treatment for.:A physician who treats disease, injury, and deformity by operation or manipulation that involves gaining access to the patient's body by incisional access.

Concepts.definition: A physician who treats disease, injury, and deformity by operation or manipulation that involves gaining access to the patient's body by incisional access.

Property.preferredDefinition: A list of items required or things to be done or considered.:Complete; having every necessary or normal part or component or step; or having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: A list of items required or things to be done or considered.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: A procedure to remove or repair a part of the body or to find out whether disease is present. An operation.
